dt-option.name: language.infoFiltered
dt-option.summary: Appended string to the summary information when the table is filtered
dt-option.description:
When a user filters the information in a table, this string is appended to the information (`info`) to give an idea of how strong the filtering is.
The token `_MAX_` is dynamically updated - see `dt-init language.info` for information about all available tokens.

example.title: Alter the filtering information summary string
